name: OMBRE SERVICES
description:
**OMBRE YOUR BUNDLES AND CLOSURES**

The hair world borrowed the term 'Ombre' from the french word meaning shaded or shading. Ombre hair color is generally darker at the roots through the mid-shaft and then gradually gets lighter from the mid-shaft to the ends. It is usually achieved using a balayage technique.

***PLEASE NOTE*****

FOR OMBRE SERVICES PLEASE ADD AN ADDITIONAL 1-3 DAYS TO PROCESSING PERIOD. Please see our shipping policy.

FOR ANY ADDITIONAL COLOR OTHER THAN BLONDE, PLEASE EMAIL A PICTURE OF THE COLOR YOU WANT SO WE CAN MATCH IT AS BEST AS WE POSSIBLE CAN.

There are no exchanges or refunds on custom colored hair.

name: BODYWAVE and STRAIGHT SILK BASE CLOSURE
description:
Our Silk Base Closures are made of 100% Virgin hair. You treat the closures with the same care as you would the bundles of our Wefted hair. The closures can be straightened, dyed, washed, and curled. 

TEXTURES FOR THE SILK BASE CLOSURES
*Brazilian Bodywave and Straight 10"-20"
*Peruvian Bodywave and Straight 10"-20"
*Eurasian Bodywave and Straight 10"-20"

-4"x4"or 3.5"X4" 
-Baby Hair: Included in front 
-Color: Natural Brown 1b 
-Part Direction: Can part in any direction 
-Knots are lightly bleached 
-Density: 120% 
-Tangle and Shed Free 
-PU/Lace around the Parameter (except the front) 
*PU prevents the closure from being damaged during install 
-Last years with proper care
